operations¶

Call¶

An operation primitive that contains an app that it runs.

class Call(ctx)¶

Bases: operations.operation.Operation

run(inp, out)¶

Handles possible redirections and runs the app.

Can handle both input and output redirections.

In case there is an input redirection and some piped input it will prioritise redirected input.

In case there is an output redirection will create an empty deque for the output and store results in the output file. Will return any output that was passed as the argument.

Parameters

inp() –

validate_context(ctx)¶

Checks if context of the operation is valid.

Parameters

ctx (dict) – Dictionary that maps value string to some arbitrarily typed data

Raises

ContextError – If the context provided doesn’t contain the correct keys or the values of the dictionary are not properly typed

operation¶

This is an interface definition for an Operation class.

class Operation(ctx)¶

Bases: object

Interface for an operation

Operations are created on the transforming stage. Operations are either a Call or some connective that combines multiple operations such as Pipe.

abstract run(inp, out)¶

Runs the operation

Parameters

  • inp (deque) – Piped input to the operation.

  • out (out) – output of all operations that were run before the current one

abstract validate_context(ctx)¶

Checks if context of the operation is valid.

Parameters

ctx (dict) – Dictionary that maps value string to some arbitrarily typed data

Raises

ContextError – If the context provided doesn’t contain the correct keys or the values of the dictionary are not properly typed

operation_factory¶

Operation Factory is used to create operation objects on given string.

class OperationFactory¶

Bases: object

A class that is used to create operations objects

operations = {'call': <class 'operations.call.Call'>, 'pipe': <class 'operations.pipe.Pipe'>, 'seq': <class 'operations.sequence.Sequence'>}¶

Operations dict that maps operation names to their classes

classmethod get_operation(op_str, ctx)¶

Returns an operation object given the operation name and context data

Parameters

  • op_str (str) – Name of the operation.

  • ctx (dict) – a context dictionary containing information required for initialisation of a certain concrete Operation object Maps property name to arbitrarily typed data.

Returns

Concrete operation object.

Return type

Operation

pipe¶

class Pipe(data)¶

Bases: operations.operation.Operation

Standard pipe that redirects the output of one program to the input of another.

run(inp, out)¶

Runs the operation

Parameters

  • out (out) – output of all operations that were run before the current one
